name: factori
summary:
factori is a game about creating all the letters of the alphabet from the letter i, chaining together a system of satisfying factories to form words. starting with the letter i, you will apply rotations, reflections, bending, and merging to craft more complex letters. create your interconnected system of factories and link them to the blue bins at the top of the screen to produce the required letter or word.

then sit back and smile as your beautiful machines chug along.
